data.title: See Krista Allen Nude
data.meta_description: See Krista Allen nude in a complete list of all of her sexiest appearances. Join Mr. Skin today to watch the entire Krista Allen nude catalog!
data.text: A bodacious body, a rock-solid rack, and a face like a feline sex sorceress, bewitching brunette Krista Allen managed transition from late night softcore sensuality, to soap opera stardom, all the way to big screen blockbusters, and had us busting every step of the way. Krista got her start bringing together ET's and T and A in the Emmanuelle in Space series of softcore sci-fi. In Emmanuelle in Space: One Last Fling (1994), she plays a human woman teaching aliens all about sex, showing all three B's while getting lezzy with a blonde. This is a feat she continues in Emmanuelle in Space: A World of Desire (1994) before adding the aid of a lucky gentleman to really give them the manual on bedding Emmanuelle. More sexiness, including an ass we'd travel to the ISS for, continued in Emmanuelle in Space: A Time to Dream (1994) as well as Emmanuelle in Space: A Lesson in Love (1994). Back on earth, in 1996 Krista landed the role of Billie Reed on Days of Our Lives, but kept the nudity train going in her big screen debut, Raven (1997), where Krista shows off her heaters riding a guy in front of a fire. While a brief scene, briefs got a whole lot tighter when Krista played the well endowed woman in the elevator Jim Carrey lets know is being treated so nicely because of her enormous jugs, in Liar, Liar (1997). Truth be told, there was a great look at her boobs and butt both in the shower and as part of a human sacrifice in The Hunted Sea (1997). On Fox, her episode of The X Files, "First Person Shooter" was widely panned, but Krista looked great in a thong as the murderous stripper Maitreya/Jade Blue. Well, not as good as she looked donning the iconic red one-piece in Baywatch. With this mainstream success came roles in movies like Anger Management (2003) and The Final Destination (2009), as well as in television shows like Charmed, CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, Monk, Frasier and Two and a Half Men. On Smallville she played a villain with the power to control men via sex pheromones, which sounds cool unless you've seen Krista's boobs and realize it's both unnecessary and stupid. But most recently Krista has been on the CW's Significant Mother, a show about a guy coming to terms with the fact that his best friend is banging his mom. Be sure to check out her now mature mammaries barely being contained by a red bra. In Liar, Liar Krista's colossal cannons make Jim Carrey scream "mama!" Decades later, while the statement is now true, they still are.
